config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration code is using the defaultEscape setting from the database settings to get the search string escape character. It is being used in the getSearchStringEscape method and also passed as a parameter in the CompareLike constructor.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration is triggered whenever the getSearchStringEscape method is called or when a new instance of CompareLike is created with the defaultEscape setting.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the configuration option is that it determines the escape character used for search strings in the database queries. This can affect the behavior of search operations and potentially the performance of the system depending on the complexity of the escape character.
